content: Demis Hassabis, Co-founder and CEO of Google DeepMind, believes that solving "root node" problems in fusion energy and material science is part of the path to Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).
Demis Hassabis envisions the rise of world models and simulations as a component of the path to Artificial General Intelligence (AGI).
Balancing scientific rigor is important amid the competitive dynamics of AI advancement.
